name: Stronghold Defenders
description:
Stronghold Defenders is a Tower Defense game with a twist. Unlike normal Tower Defense games, you have gathering units and resources to manage as well as your defending units that are used to attack enemies. 

This adds another strategy layer to the game where you have to make decisions every turn on what resources you want to gather and if you want to recruit a defender or a gatherer. 

You also need to provide food resources for your units to keep them fed and happy. If they become hungry, their stats will get weakened until they are fed again.

Other than spending your resources on upgrades and new recruits, you can also spend it on buildings like farms, towers and houses. 

There are many different approaches in playing this game, make up your own strategy and see what works. If it fails, then you can try a different approach, it is up to you how you want to play this game!
